narrative.narrative: Palestinian Airlines is owned by the Palestinian Authority. It is based at El Arish Airport in Egypt. It was founded in 1995 but didn't start operation until 1997. As of 2013 it served Cairo,Amman Civil Airport in Jordan and Jeddah,Saudi Arabia. They as of August 2014 have two Fokker 50's and had two Dash 8-300's from 2000-2004. They also had an Il-62 at one time and a 727-200.
